root: ^Oh, you startled me! I did not expect to see another climber around. My name's Rita.

c-1: ^Well that's not too nice! Be on your way then, careful you don't slip! Hmph.
^...Alright. The climb took its toll on you didn't it? Anyways,

met: ^The wizard said there's all sorts of treasure at the top. Doesn't that sound intriguing?
^Can't wait to get my hands on it.

c-0: ^If you can beat me to it!
c-1: ^Hmm, looking for adventure. I see. I'll give it to you, the sheer scale of this place is pretty intimidating.

part2: ^Hey, you know what I was thinking? How does that wizard know what's at the top??
^Is it his tower or something? Then he must have the key. Maybe we could just steal it and take the stairs! Would save us a lot of trouble.
^Stealing from old men is not my thing

c-0: ^Faint of heart eh? That's fine, I wasn't seriously considering it.
c-1: ^Well, I don't really feel like climbing down just yet. I just got here! And it wasn't easy!

part3: ^Take a break here if you want. I'll stay here for a while longer. But don't you get cocky! I'll definetly beat you to the treasure!
